com.facebook.buck.rules.modern.builders

Interface IsolatedExecution

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GrpcRemoteExecution, OutOfProcessIsolatedExecution, RemoteExecution

    public interface IsolatedExecution
extends Closeable
    Interface used to implement various isolated execution strategies. In these strategies, buildrules are run in isolation (i.e. outside of the real build root, in a different directory, on a different machine, etc).

    • Method Summary
